MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. We had no advance warning of this, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have found a tree on an overhead line at Woodend Carmichael and are continuing to make repairs but due to further works required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 9pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:28 PM on Thursday, 21 January 2021.
